mapper.select: SELECT ID , EMPLOYEE_FIRST_NAME , EMPLOYEE_LAST_NAME , COMPANY_NAME , COMPANY_ADDRESS , COMPANY_CITY , COMPANY_COUNTY , COMPANY_STATE , COMPANY_ZIP , COMPANY_PHONE1 , PERSONAL_PHONE2 , PERSONAL_EMAIL , COMPANY_WEB FROM dev.US_500 ORDER BY ID ASC LIMIT #{_skiprows}, #{_pagesize}

SELECT ID , EMPLOYEE_FIRST_NAME , EMPLOYEE_LAST_NAME , COMPANY_NAME , COMPANY_ADDRESS , COMPANY_CITY , COMPANY_COUNTY , COMPANY_STATE , COMPANY_ZIP , COMPANY_PHONE1 , PERSONAL_PHONE2 , PERSONAL_EMAIL , COMPANY_WEB FROM dev.US_500 WHERE 1 = 1 AND ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE dev.US_500 SET UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser} , UPDATE_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dev.US_500 WHERE 1 = 1 AND ID = #{id}
